content.raw:
The thing with `createEntity` is... While for models there is `~/factory` and `~/model/modify`, for lights, both spawning a new one and modifying an existing one use `~/light`. 

So I created this variable in order to differentiate the two light topics on `GazeboInterface.cc`. It is only used by the lights, but ends up in the models too... I'm sure there must be a more elegant way to do it...
content.html:
The thing with createEntity is... While for models there is ~/factory and ~/model/modify, for lights, both spawning a new one and modifying an existing one use ~/light.

So I created this variable in order to differentiate the two light topics on GazeboInterface.cc. It is only used by the lights, but ends up in the models too... I'm sure there must be a more elegant way to do it...
